channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
i've been having so much trouble with this client. it's a 317 shard, I made a webclient for it. it's creativescape's client. The client works fine when its in downloadable batch/jar form, but when I sign it and upload it, the client loads and everything, but won't connect.
Any ideas here ? /:

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @iHype iHype
item.description:
